-- ============================================
-- TC-01: Project Invitations (V2 API)
-- ============================================
-- This test is executed via the API Explorer.
-- Log in as alice in one browser, bob in another.
--
-- STEP 1: Create a project as alice
--   POST /api/v2/projects
--   {"name": "invitation-test"}
--
-- STEP 2: Invite bob (use the project_id from step 1)
--   POST /api/v2/project-invitations
--   {"project_id": "<id>", "username": "bob", "access_level": "member"}
--   EXPECTED: 200 OK
--
-- STEP 3: List invitations as bob
--   GET /api/v2/project-invitations
--   EXPECTED: list with one invitation
--
-- STEP 4: List invitations for user/project with none
--   EXPECTED: empty list
--
-- STEP 5: Accept invitation as bob
--   POST /api/v2/project-invitations/accept/<projectId>
--   GET /api/v2/projects
--   EXPECTED: invitation gone, bob sees the project
--
-- STEP 6: Create new invitation, then delete it
--   DELETE /api/v2/project-invitations/<id>
--   EXPECTED: invitation deleted
-- ============================================
SELECT 'See comments above for API test steps' AS instructions;
